tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CourseSchedule (
  course_id INT,
  course_name VARCHAR(255),
  instructor_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  assignment_name VARCHAR(255),
  deadline DATE
)

CREATE TABLE assignment (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT,
    assignment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    deadline DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES course_schedule(course_id)
);

CREATE TABLE assignments (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT,
    assignment_name VARCHAR(255),
    deadline DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES course_schedule(course_id)
);

CREATE TABLE deadlines (
    deadline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assignment_id INT,
    deadline_time TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (assignment_id) REFERENCES assignments(assignment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE assignments (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT,
    assignment_name VARCHAR(255),
    deadline DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES course_schedule(course_id)
);

CREATE TABLE deadlines (
    deadline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assignment_id INT,
    deadline_date DATE,
    reminder_sent BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (assignment_id) REFERENCES assignments(assignment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE time_management (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    deadline_id INT,
    completed BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (deadline_id) REFERENCES deadlines(deadline_id)
);

CREATE TABLE assignments (
  assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  assignment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  assignment_description TEXT,
  course_id INT,
  deadline DATE
);

CREATE TABLE deadlines (
  deadline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  deadline_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  deadline_description TEXT,
  course_id INT,
  assignment_id INT,
  due_date DATE
);
